articles.description: Ireland wrestle control of Pool B with a statement win over holders South Africa in a low scoring but riveting World Cup slugfest in Paris.
articles.title: Ireland earn statement win over holders South Africa

articles.description: Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola says he is angry with Rodri for being sent off in his side's win over Nottingham Forest - but also criticises referee Anthony Taylor for his performance.
articles.title: 'I'm angry' - Guardiola upset with Rodri for red card

articles.description: The United States will take a 7-5 lead over Europe into Saturday's afternoon session after an enthralling morning in the Solheim Cup at Finca Cortesin.
articles.title: US retain two-point lead over Europe at Solheim Cup

articles.description: Henry Arundell was the headline-grabbing scorer of five tries, but Marcus Smith's influence might be of longer-lasting significance for England.
articles.title: Smith revels in England's child's play rout

articles.description: Heavyweight Joe Joyce was sensationally stopped in the third round by Zhilei Zhang in London, leaving the Briton's dream of securing a world-title shot in tatters.
articles.title: Zhang sensationally stops Joyce in round three

articles.description: Match of the Day's Gary Lineker and Danny Murphy discuss why Rasmus Hojlund will be a success for Manchester United after a promising performance in their 1-0 win at Burnley.
articles.title: Why Hojlund will be a Man Utd success - MOTD analysis

articles.description: Bruno Fernandes' stunning volley against Burnley drew shades of Robin van Persie's strike for Manchester United 10 years ago.
articles.title: Shades of Van Persie - Fernandes hits 'one of goals of season'

articles.description: An experimental England side eventually defeat Ireland in the second one-day international at Trent Bridge.
articles.title: Experimental England defeat Ireland in second ODI

articles.description: Johnny Eblen stops Fabian Edwards in the third round to defend his middleweight title at Bellator 299 in Dublin.
articles.title: Edwards stopped by Eblen at Bellator 299

articles.description: Lewis Hamilton says he can "only beat the drum so much" to his Mercedes team about fixing the problems with their car for next season.
articles.title: Hamilton wants ‘real change’ in Mercedes car
